"Ah, <%me>!<br>Listen, listen!<br>It's t: "While the hype of Summoner has calmed down, another new class has sprung up called Hero!"

"Despite my existence...
I am so sad... Yoyoyoyo..."
"Please ignore Katori."
"I've heard that Huey commissioned research into creating a new class."
"The wide selection of new classes will be good for ARKS. Please let us know if there's anything we can do."
"So it's come to that I see, Saga, where you cast me aside and mention me with just a single word..."
"<%me> and Saga, please pay attention to me and don't be seduced by the lure of Hero!"
"Oh, <%me>! Hello!"
"Ack, it's you...!"
"Ah, speak of the devil."
"...By any chance, are you two, Katori and Saga!?"
"I-If we said yes, what are you going to do!?"
"I've heard so much about you two! Being in charge of Bouncer's training and operations."
"Both of you put in so much effort in spreading Bouncer! I'm honored to be able to meet you!"
"Eh? Ah... Well that's right!"
"Amazing! That's so cool! It must have been really hard getting established!"
"That's-- That's right. It was really hard work, however if you do it for the sake of ARKS, then it isn't hard at all."
"Stratos, was it? I've heard that you're also trying to spread a new class as well?"
"Yes, I'm happy to know that you've heard of it. However, I've still much to learn and I haven't had much success like you two have..."
"And while <%me> is helping me, it's still very difficult..."
"There's no need to rush. We've also took time spreading the word of Bouncer as well."
"We've asked <%me> for assistance, plenty of times. We wouldn't be talking today without it."
"Wouldn't you agree, Katori?"
"Yes! What Saga says is true!"
"It'll be alright, Stratos!"
"With <%me> helping you, publicity is guaranteed!"
"Saga, Katori... Thank you very much!"
"Could I ask you some questions later, if it isn't too much trouble?"
"Of course! You can ask us anything!"
"...Thank you! If I need help with something, I'll ask straight away!"
"Stratos... What a nice kid."
"<%me>! And Saga! Let's work hard to spread Hero as well!"
